title: Assistant Professor Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Louisiana Tech University
Interview Descriptions: Few standard questions about teaching and research experience, previous background, teaching interests, publications, dissertation, future research, balance teaching, service, and research, reasons to choose LTU, how to work in a diverse environment.
Interview Questions: Talk about your teaching and research experience.

title: Front Desk Staff Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Louisiana Tech University
Interview Descriptions: Very laid back and friendly staff. I was immediately offered a position from this employee. There were not any hard questions and I felt that I could easily carry on a conversation.
Interview Questions: How well do I handle working late at night or in early hours?

title: Resident Assistant (RA) Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Louisiana Tech University
Interview Descriptions: A simple 30 minute interview with the coordinators of residential life and hall directors. Questions regarding leadership skills and professionalism were asked. After the interview, they notify candidates within a week.
Interview Questions: What experience do you have that would make you a good fit for the job?

title: Student Worker Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Louisiana Tech University (Ruston, LA)
Interview Descriptions: Very organized and friendly. Was more like a conversation than an interview.  I was asked a series of questions, which were already prepared by the staff. The interview was more job-related not really resume oriented.
Interview Questions:
Tell me about yourselves?
How does your team see you?
What are your goals?

title: Student Worker Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Louisiana Tech University in Oct 2020
Interview Descriptions: The interview was very relaxed. I enjoyed talking with the woman who would soon hire me and getting to know more about her and the job before I was hired.
Interview Questions: Describe your experience related to this field.

title: Student Worker Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Louisiana Tech University (Ruston, LA)
Interview Descriptions: The process was very fast and calm. There was an in person Interview with the Secretary first and then you speak with the Undergraduate dean. He is very easy to talk to and makes the interview very calming.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work here?

title: Graduate Teaching Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Louisiana Tech University
Interview Descriptions: dropped off my resume to the respective department. constantly went for followups, when the position was available got a call form the department to set up an appointment. they asked very generic question. asked about my experience and my working hours.
Interview Questions: describe yourself?

title: Program Director Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at Louisiana Tech University (Ruston, LA) in Sept 2017
Interview Descriptions: Laid back and relaxed. More of a conversation. Interviewer was great. Asked a lot of questions. Be prepared to talk about yourself and how you're inspired to make chances and advance projects forward.
Interview Questions: What's inspiring to you? What changes do you want to make?

title: Research Associate Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Louisiana Tech University
Interview Descriptions: Contract position, totally take around 2 months,  apply through friend reference through email, after phone interview by direct boss, ask some skills and experience, get offer after about 3 weeks.
Interview Questions: What major challenges and problems did you face? How did you handle them?

title: Teaching Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at Louisiana Tech University (Ruston, LA) in Jan 2017
Interview Descriptions:
Introduce the architecture of the could computing
Introduce the AWS main services. EC2, RDS, ECS
Introduce load balancer and HPC hearth check mechanism 
Design a cloud computing project with AWS.
30 mins presentation
10 mins question time
two perforator individual interview
Interview Questions: introduce the cloud computing and AWS

title: Library Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Louisiana Tech University (Ruston, LA) in Apr 2016
Interview Descriptions: Just told about all the work details and how the scheduling works. Its a normal job and not very hard, just do your job and everything is fine. Not a very big interview process but need to be able to work properly
Interview Questions: It was just routine interview to assess if you can do the job.

title: Graduate Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Louisiana Tech University
Interview Descriptions: There was none.. position was gotten by academic merit and Teacher Recommendations. Graduate Assistants are mainly internationals to help them get out-of-state scholarship fee waiver. After you have been accepted you go through an Orientation process that explain your duties and meet with the payroll office. That's about it.
Interview Questions: N/A

title: Web Developer Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Louisiana Tech University (Ruston, LA) in Aug 2014
Interview Descriptions:
in person and coding was required. background of php.Team orientated development of complex web based applications.
Front end development using HTML, CSS, Javascript, JQuery, AJAX and others.
Maintaining existing codebase, including troubleshooting, bug fixing and new feature integration.
Interview Questions: code a interface system which can take details of students in php and also validate the entered details

title: Postdoctoral Research Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Louisiana Tech University (Ruston, LA) in Jul 2014
Interview Descriptions: I had submitted the resume to a professor showing my intention to join his group as a postdoctoral research associate. After reviewing he called me for the interview 1:1. Then his senior postdoctoral researcher interviewed me regarding my future interest and endeavors. The decision was made on the same day of the interview.
Interview Questions: What are your future plans?

title: Graduate Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Louisiana Tech University (Ruston, LA) in Jan 2014
Interview Descriptions: Find a professor you like, mostly you want it will be someone who related to your major, make a meeting and be polite to him/her since you are only a student.
Interview Questions: What can you do for me?

title: Graduate Research Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Louisiana Tech University (Ruston, LA) in Oct 2013
Interview Descriptions: I talked with the supervisor about the possible future opening. luckily there was one and I showed my interest. I was asked to come and visit him in his tomorrow. We had an hour long chit-chat about my research interest and few other question that was not research related.
Interview Questions: where do you see urself in five years?

title: Assistant Professor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Louisiana Tech University
Interview Descriptions: Very relaxed, very friendly.  Search committee/chair was  and happy to show me around town and offer housing suggestions.
Interview Questions: N/A

title: Hall Director Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at Louisiana Tech University (Ruston, LA) in Mar 2013
Interview Descriptions: It is a presentation based interview. The presentation they will not tell you what to make it on but i would focus on the key aspects of what a hall director does. (Leadership, communication, ability to relate, and etc.)
Interview Questions: Why do you want to be Hall Director?

title: Graduate Research Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 4 days. I interviewed at Louisiana Tech University (Ruston, LA) in Jan 2013
Interview Descriptions: Question regarding chemical process, fabrication knowledge, discussion on two research papers. He ask lot of question regarding safety and consistency  during  experiments. Question regarding previous experience as research assistant. Discussion about current research, direction reason and purpose.   Employer also asked question regrading experience in programing language, research interest, and research direction
Interview Questions: What are possible safety measures required during experiment with oxygen plasma? Why oxygen plasma works?

title: Adm Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at Louisiana Tech University (Ruston, LA) in Sept 2012
Interview Descriptions: Interview panel was very professional and accurately described the duties and expectations of the position. Asked relevant questions regarding skills and experience. Provided brief descriptions and examples of work scenarios and asked how the applicant would handle the situations.  The interviewers were very polite and followed up after the interview in a timely manner.
Interview Questions: How well do you prioritize?

title: Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Louisiana Tech University (Ruston, LA) in Jun 2012
Interview Descriptions: I submitted my application and received a phone call to set an interview time and date.  I then participated in a four to one panel interview, where they asked typical interview questions; after that interview concluded and i was later contacted for a two to one interview.
Interview Questions: Describe scenarios from past work experience.

title: Post Doctoral Research Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Louisiana Tech University (Ruston, LA) in Apr 2012
Interview Descriptions: The interview was in very friendly environment. First I applied, then I got a main informing that I was selected for short list of candidates. Then They used skype for the interview, since I was not in Louisiana. They asked lot of question on my subject.
Interview Questions: how can you help us on our research program?

title: Research Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Louisiana Tech University (Ruston, LA) in Jan 2012
Interview Descriptions: It was a brief interview.  It described the details of the job and what would be expected. It require alot of dedication. It was not very difficult to understand the material. You had to be punctual and you had to produce results befitting your role.
Interview Questions: How do you think you will handle multiple responsibilities

title: Graduate Research Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Louisiana Tech University (Ruston, LA) in Mar 2011
Interview Descriptions: Panel of faculty and student asked questions about academic and work goals.  You were asked about your specific research interests, whether you wanted a future job in practice or academia and if you could comply with general office standards of conduct and dress. If you never had a job before, could be intimidating. If you've had a job before in an office, it was easy.
Interview Questions: Can you work overtime as needed?

title: Research Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Louisiana Tech University (Ruston, LA) in Mar 2011
Interview Descriptions: not competitive, anyone can get if the professor has funds
Interview Questions: do you have any experience on the job you are applying

title: Graduate Research Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Louisiana Tech University (Ruston, LA) in Sept 2008
Interview Descriptions: Good Admission packet ..
Interview Questions: Why do you want to continue your Research in physics when the money is clearly elsewhere?

Application Type: I interviewed at Louisiana Tech University
Interview Descriptions: Few standard questions about teaching and research experience, previous background, teaching interests, publications, dissertation, future research, balance teaching, service, and research, reasons to choose LTU, how to work in a diverse environment.
Interview Questions: Talk about your teaching and research experience.
